name: Back in My Day (JollyCoopCo)
description:
A Cooperative Beat 'Em Up with Narrative and Roguelike Elements!

Traverse through a dreamscape full of danger as your Grandpa describes the many difficulties of getting to school back when he was a kid!

Compatible for controllers and keyboard & mouse. Requires steam to be open in the background in order to access multiplayer (highly recommended). Created as part of the 2022 Ubisoft Game Lab Competition. Download is available below!

Developed by team Les Ananas. Meet the team below!

Product Owner/Designer - Michael Silverio (portfolio)

Designer - Aiden Wright (portfolio)

Character Artist - Frannie McCarthy

Environment/UI/VFX Artist - Jimmy Jiang (portfolio)

Network Programmer -  Colin Deane (portfolio)

AI Programmer - Andrew Hunt (portfolio)

Audio Designer - Michael St Louis (portfolio)

Producer - Kendrick Ng-Yow (JollyCoopCo)

If you enjoyed the game, please consider following JollyCoopCo for more content and add a comment below!
